dt2.3:4.5: maggasaccena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?
dt2.3:4.6: Te dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.3:5.1: Nirodhasaccena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā … pe …
dt2.3:5.3: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.3:6.1: Jīvitindriyena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā … pe …
dt2.3:6.3: te dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā dvīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.3:7.22: kammabhavena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā … pe …
dt2.3:7.24: te dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.3:8.4: jhānena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā … pe …
dt2.3:8.6: te dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā dvīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.3:9.19: hetūhi ceva sahetukehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.3:9.20: hetūhi ceva hetusampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā … pe …
dt2.3:9.22: te dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.3:10.2: asaṅkhatehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā … pe …
dt2.3:10.4: te dhammā catūhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.3:11.2: āsavehi ceva sāsavehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.3:11.3: āsavehi ceva āsavasampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā …
dt2.3:11.4: te dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.3:12.7: parāmāsehi ceva parāmaṭṭhehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā …
dt2.3:12.8: te dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.3:13.6: cittasaṃsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattīhi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā … pe …
dt2.3:13.8: te dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.3:14.2: cittānuparivattīhi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā … pe …
dt2.3:14.4: te dhammā na kehici khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
dt2.3:15.3: kilesehi ceva saṃkilesikehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.3:15.4: kilesehi ceva saṃkiliṭṭhehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā …
dt2.3:15.5: kilesehi ceva kilesasampayuttehi ca dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitā dhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā, te dhammā katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhi saṅgahitā?
dt2.3:15.6: Te dhammā asaṅkhataṃ khandhato ṭhapetvā tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā.
